member.name: PERCEIVED
member.summary: Specifies a file's perceived type. This set of constants is used in the function.

member.name: PERCEIVED.PERCEIVED_TYPE_CUSTOM
member.summary: The file's perceived type as defined in the registry is not a known type.

member.name: PERCEIVED.PERCEIVED_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED
member.summary: The file does not have a perceived type.

member.name: PERCEIVED.PERCEIVED_TYPE_UNKNOWN
member.summary: The file's perceived type hasn't yet been requested. This is the cached type of the object when it is created. This value is never returned by .

member.name: PERCEIVED.PERCEIVED_TYPE_GAMEMEDIA
member.summary: Windows Vista and later. The file's perceived type is "gamemedia".

member.name: PERCEIVED.PERCEIVED_TYPE_CONTACTS
member.summary: Windows Vista and later.The file's perceived type is "contacts"
